title: India hydropower output records steepest fall in nearly four decades
description: India experienced a drastic 16.3% drop in hydroelectricity output, the steepest decline in at least 38 years, due to erratic rainfall. This led to increased reliance on coal-fired power, with renewables' share in power generation decreasing for the first time since commitments made in 2015.
